name: datenteiler
text:
@roytang Fingers crossed that it stays that way this time. 🤞😉

Personally I'm not a fan of dual boot. Either a Windows update breaks it, or you end up only booting Windows. I prefer to have Linux completely on a SSD and Windows in a VM like VirtualBox or KVM/QEMU. That works quite well for me for the few times I need Windows.
